Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Western (Congress)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing Western (Congress) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing Western (Congress) due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#7 Harrison

#50 Damen

#49 Western

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
